name: pdfding
description: PdfDing is a self-hosted PDF toolkit supporting operations like merging, splitting, rotating, and compressing PDFs. It provides a drag-and-drop web UI for ease of use.

features.title: Pdf Merging
features.description: Combine multiple PDF files into single document while preserving formatting and page order

features.title: Pdf Splitting
features.description: Extract specific pages or split PDFs into separate files based on page ranges or intervals

features.title: Page Rotation
features.description: Rotate individual pages or entire documents by 90, 180, or 270 degrees for correct orientation

features.title: Pdf Compression
features.description: Reduce file size by optimizing images and removing unnecessary data while maintaining acceptable quality

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Intuitive web UI allows file uploads and page reordering through simple drag-and-drop interactions

features.title: Batch Processing
features.description: Apply operations to multiple PDFs simultaneously for efficient bulk document manipulation

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: All processing happens on your server without uploading files to third-party services

features.title: No File Size Limits
features.description: Process PDFs of any size without restrictions imposed by cloud-based services
